name: Drypers (S)
description: Client is a mother of 4 (M/4.5, M/3.5, F/2 and M/newborn). Client moved out of her rental flat due to feeling unsafe at home, and returned the keys to HDB on 29th July 2022, as her husband had borrowed from illegal moneylenders and she was harassed at her home. Client and her 4 children currently live with her aunt and uncle. Client is presently the primary caregiver for her newborn, and therefore, is not working. Her husband is suspected to be using drugs, and therefore, does not provide for her. Whilst her aunt and uncle have been doing their best in providing for client and the 4 children, they are also living from paycheck to paycheck, and hence struggle to provide more for the children. As such, the family are limited in their financial resources and are unable to buy milk powder and diapers for the children.

description:

Husband is the sole breadwinner of the family as client is the main caregiver for the children. 
The family experiences difficulties in making ends meet, amidst having multiple health and chronic issues as well. 
The children have been experiencing back-to-back medical exigencies and client hopes that an air purifier could help to reduce the risk of the children falling sick.

name: Television

name: 40 pieces of 227g Anchor unsalted butter
description: We are requesting for 40 pieces of 227g of Anchor unsalted butter for our cooking / consumption usage. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 120 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: 20 X 150g dried prawns

name: Handphone
description: Family has 4 young children aged ranging from 3 to 8 years old. Mother has been separated from the children after divorce and is now living in a rental flat at Bukit Panjang while the children live with their father in Punggol. The donated phone will be for the children to video call with their mother so that they can remain in contact everyday as it is difficult for mother to travel down to Punggol everyday to see them. As father returns home late and close to the children's bedtime almost everyday, they have limited ability to use father's phone to contact mother. As such, the children will benefit from having their own phone so that they can call their mother during the day as well, without father being around.

name: Groceries (Halal)

Food ration items: egg, fish (fresh), vegetables, fishball, hotdog, crabmeat, biscuits, onion, chicken stock cubes and other food items that donor would like to support. (Halal)

Milo Packets (any amount)

name: Children Items
description:
Similac Stage 3 Milk, Huggies Tape M Size, Organic Puffs and/or cereal snacks for 1 year old. 

Client is a single mother to a 1 year old girl. She was also a victim of spousal violence and is currently undergoing a divorce and taking efforts to stabilize herself. She struggles with finding stable employment at present and is facing financial difficulties. She would like to request for donations of the above essentials for her growing child while she continues with her job-seeking efforts.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre - Hougang
contact.name: Chan Jun Ren

name: CCTV installation
description:
Ct, hb and 4 children recently moved into new rental flat after residing with parents for a long time and requires a TV of their own as a form of entertainment and relaxation to engage the family. The family has financial constraints and has been trying their best to get second-hand household items and the TV will benefit them greatly. There are also concerns for their safety due to confidential reasons and requires CCTV installation outside their house.

If interested, WhatsApp text 6690 1018

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Denis Ho

name: Tena slip Plus Unisex Adult Diapers-Large
description: The client is diagnosed with depression and prostrate cancer supported by his 2 elderly sisters who are fully retired. The caregivers need to daily put on antiseptic cream on his rashes, and clean the private parts before putting on a new diaper. They will surely benefit from the diapers donation to lessen their financial burden. Interested persons can contact CREST worker Sangeeta at 97284280 or sangeetashah@fycs.org

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Services - Mental Health
contact.name: Shah Sangeeta Subejan

name: 20 X 3kg white sugar
description: We are requesting for 20 packets of 3kg white sugar as we cook 3 meals a day or for breakfast and tea break for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: 5kg of ikan bilis
description: We are requesting for 5kg of ikan bilis as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: 40 X 227g butter
description: We are requesting for 40 pieces of 227g of butter for our cooking / consumption usage. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: Cat Food
description: Client is a 32 y/o mother to two children. She is currently pregnant and suffers from hyperemesis gravidarum - an extreme and persistent nausea and vomiting during pregnancy. As such, she is unable to work. Her husband is still undergoing a security guard course, so they are both unemployed. She is in need of cat food for her cats as they are malnourished and she does not have enough money to buy food for them.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Hand Sanitizers
description: We would like to request for 50 bottles of hand sanitizers (500ml pump type) for our 7 daycare centres. Expiry date should preferably be 1-2 years from now. Kindly email for details / arrangements. Thank you.

name: Coffee powder 9kg (Tin)
description: Our home need 5 tins of 9kg Coffee powder for our 522 elderly residents. Thank you

contact.org: Ju Eng Home For Senior Citizens
contact.name: Lee Jun Hui

name: Frozen Food Rations needed
description: Single mother and two teen children residing in rental flat requests for frozen food rations and some basic supplies. She is certified unfit for employment due to recent suicide ideation and thoughts of attempting suicide. The family is struggling financially to cope. Looking for kind donors. Please whatsapp me at 81096845 during office hours. Thank you.

contact.org: Hougang Sheng Hong Family Service Centre
contact.name: Angie Tan

name: IT Equipment
description: We are requesting for 6 sets of Mesh devices TP-Link Deco X20 AX 1800, and Google Chromecast with TV for 6 daycare centres. The current Wi-Fi Mesh devices Airties 4920 (launched in 2014) is outdated, and staff must connect televisions to computers to access online content for clients. With updated devices, our clients can enjoy new activities as the new devices allow access to Android apps, online activities that could not be accessed to due limited Wi-Fi access, and our staff can spend more time engaging with clients as they perform their work more efficiently.

name: Laptop
description:
The family experiences barely sufficient income to sustain for basic needs. 
Client hopes to engage elderly mother in other ways, and hopes to get a used laptop for mother's use.

name: 2nd hand ipad
description: This device is requested for a 13 years old boy who has Autism. Both of his parents have multiple medical conditions, and dad has been medically unfit for work for years. Device would be greatly helpful for the boy as a communication and learning device.

name: Double Burner Table Cooker Gas Stove
description: Family of 5 (parents with 3 children) requires support to replace faulty double burner table cooker. Family is currently unable to cook due to the spoilt table cooker. Parents have unstable employment and family is unable to afford to pay for the replacement. The cost of replacement is between $130 to $150.

name: Sink Tap
description: Person is living alone and currently does not have a source of income, is depending on financial assistance. Person has a strained relationship with family, and has just gotten a rental flat. Person is hoping kind assistance for items/furniture such as a sink tap (cross head) for the rental flat. For liaison on address/collection, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you!

name: KITCHEN RACK
description: We are appealing for a KITCHEN RAC for a low income family  with yong children as the family is on public assistance and financially tight which makes it difficult for them to purchase one on their own WE SEEK FURTHER ASSISTANCE FOR THE DONOR TO ASSISTANCE FOR THE DONOR TO ASSIST IN TRANSPORTATION OR COVER THE THE TRANSPORTAION COST

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: Adult Diapers
description:
Family has an elderly mother who has several medical conditions such as dementia, diabetes, Parkinson's, etc and is wheel-chair bound. Client (son) has been working as SDA and income is insufficient to support mother's high medical needs. Family needed adult diapers to assist elderly mother in her bowel movements.

Family prefers TOP brand Size L. Please contact me if donor would like to donate other brands.

Website for TOP brand diapers:

http://www.budgetdiapers.com/product/top-adult-pull-up-pants-10s-x-12-bags-new-pkg-12-bags/
